name: A Bar in Plague Times
description: A disease has begun to ravage the land, and because of that the queen has decreed that all taverns must be closed at the stroke of midnight. Your job is to help the barmaid get rid of the last stubborn quests. But these quests aren't regular humans, magical creature roam these lands, and you have to figure out how to get them out of your bar in this time based puzzle game. The clock is ticking and you don't got much
